definitions.text: make into a whole or make part of a whole
examples: She incorporated his suggestions into her proposal

definitions.text: include or contain; have as a component
examples: A totally new idea is comprised in this paper
The record contains many old songs from the 1930's

definitions.text: unite or merge with something already in existence
examples: incorporate this document with those pertaining to the same case

definitions.text: formed or united into a whole
